pros: Good team and managers. Great first student job experience
cons: The only con is the low salary

review_title: Doctorat au laboratoire MSC - bonne experience
pros: De tres bons labos comme le MSC au sein de cette universite. Tant au niveau de la recherche que des conditions humaines.
cons: Incompetances notoire d'une partie de la structure administrative. Cela est sans doute du au modes de recrutement et de promotion de l'administration publique. Il est assez desolant d'etre ralenti dans son travail voir impacte au niveau du travail. D'autant que certains membres de l'administrations sont pour leur part formidables.

pros: A wonderful research environment, convenient location, subject close to my research interests, a good starting point for further career development
cons: Too much bureaucracy, my tasks involve financial issues that I am not interested in, including HR tasks that take too much time

pros: A multidisciplinary university helping everybody students, researchers to find their way providing theme with a lot of opportunities
cons: French political context is at the heart of everybody's preoccupations, and widening concerns. But awareness is a source of intellectual benefit.

pros: correct salary, 50 days of holiday per year, international background, associative activities, useful training.
cons: complicated administration, lack of communication in the administrative department, complicated registration and centralization of the training, not very reactive.

review_title: Do your job and move on
cons: some managing colleagues can be annoying, , all initiatives are discouraged, do your job and move on

pros: High-quality research institution with a solid background science and helpful, enthusiasm researchers
cons: The HR (for my case) is very unprofessional: unresponsible, response late or even no response to employee problems

job_title: PhD Student + University Teaching in Paris
pros: Some good labs, Paris is nice
cons: Not payed well, lack of people from similar fields of interest
